properties.title: Bains de Saillon
properties.abstract: Located at the heart of Valais, between Sion and Martigny, les Bains de Saillon is a complex of 3 thermal swimming pools, a «village» of saunas called Les Mayens du bien-être and a fantastic spa l'Espace Carpe Diem.
properties.description:
Four swimming pools including one indoors, one semi Olympic pool and a giant slope make of Les Bains de Saillon a unique destination for thermal baths enthusiasts.

Dedicated to relaxation, les Mayens du bien–être are a welcome addition with five chalets built in the heart of the outdoors garden. Each chalet offers a different atmosphere. L'Espace Carpe diem is dedicated to wellness and true relaxation. Take care of yourself with the various saunas, steam baths and other odoriums. You will also find a wide range of wellness treatments amongst others is a new Nature & Authenticité range using the natural benefits of Valais products such as a stone therapy that uses Saillon stones. This unique treatment features marble from Saillon.

A large fitness and weights area - featuring a view on the park – offers unrivalled level of service: latest generation weight and cardio machines but also professional coaching. Aerobics, spinning and Pilates classes are also offered at attractive prices.
